short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type jkl into the search bar to ask jkl.ai anything!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jkl.ai puts the power of GPT3 into your Chrome search bar. To use jkl.ai:

1. Type jkl into the search bar followed by a space
2. Type in your question or prompt to GPT3
